name: dingily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is dark and often also dirty: She was standing in a dingily lit room. He greeted us at the door, rather dingily dressed in greys and brown. See
dingy
More examplesFewer examplesCrow Road is a dingily respectable thoroughfare in Glasgow.The commercial property was decaying, and dingily lit by old strip lights.Uncle Walter dingily existed on the few hundred pounds that were left.
